p: We restrict our presentation here to known virulence factors across groups Aâ€“G, but a full complement is presented in the supplementary material (Table S3). Virulence factors that were absent in all isolates (e.g. nadA) are not included. Note that although we only include the two closed ST-192 genomes in Fig. 3, the genome content of all 278 ST-192 isolates sequenced in this study are considered for the purposes of Table 1.
